text: This was a repeat purchase, so nothing more need be said!  Although this is a very pleasing coffee, it is not Jet Fuel.  This is not a knock, but rather a statement of fact!  Fog Chaser has its own taste, one you don't have to search for.  Once the pak of 12 has been opened, store the remaining pods in a seal-tight container.  And the PRICE is RIGHT!  :o)
